statements: SELECT * FROM health_records WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM health_records WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM health_records WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT patient_name FROM health_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT * FROM health_records ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM health_records WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM health_records WHERE patient_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM health_records WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19'
SELECT * FROM health_records WHERE age >= 40 AND treatment_history LIKE '%surgery%'
SELECT patient_name, age FROM health_records WHERE diagnosis IS NULL
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, dob, weight FROM patients ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT * FROM treatments WHERE cost > 1000;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_date, treatment_description FROM treatments ORDER BY treatment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, dob, gender FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_name, treatment_date, treatment_description FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(treatment_id) AS num_treatments FROM treatments GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, SUM(cost) AS total_cost FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, gender, date_of_birth FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, address FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment FROM patients JOIN health_records ON patients.patient_id = health_records.patient_id;

SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment, treatment_date FROM patients JOIN health_records ON patients.patient_id = health_records.patient_id JOIN treatment_history ON health_records.record_id = treatment_history.record_id;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY patient_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1999-12-31';

SELECT patients.patient_name, health_records.diagnosis, treatment_history.medication FROM patients INNER JOIN health_records ON patients.patient_id = health_records.patient_id INNER JOIN treatment_history ON health_records.record_id = treatment_history.record_id WHERE treatment_history.dosage > 100 ORDER BY health_records.record_date ASC;

SELECT patients.patient_name, treatment_history.medication, treatment_history.dosage FROM patients LEFT JOIN health_records ON patients.patient_id = health_records.patient_id LEFT JOIN treatment_history ON health_records.record_id = treatment_history.record_id WHERE health_records.record_date >= '2022-01-01' AND health_records.record_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY patients.patient_name LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT patients.patient_name, health_records.diagnosis FROM patients JOIN health_records ON patients.patient_id = health_records.patient_id WHERE health_records.diagnosis LIKE '%infection%';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, address FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM health_records ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, treatment_date FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age;
SELECT treatment_name, treatment_description FROM treatments JOIN patients ON treatments.patient_id = patients.patient_id WHERE patients.age < 40 ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, address FROM patients JOIN health_records ON patients.patient_id = health_records.patient_id WHERE heart_rate > 100 AND blood_pressure < 80;
SELECT professional_name, specialization, experience_years FROM medical_professionals WHERE experience_years > 10 ORDER BY specialization, professional_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, address FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_name, phone_number FROM patients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients JOIN health_records ON patients.patient_id = health_records.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, address FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_name, doctor_name, diagnosis, treatment FROM patients INNER JOIN health_records ON patients.patient_id = health_records.patient_id;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM medications WHERE dosage='500mg';
SELECT appointment_date, reason FROM appointments WHERE patient_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
